definition: congruent (math.)/having same residue modulo some number
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
congruence (math.)/equation for residue modulo some number

sentences.english: This paper has investigated the system of congruences and given them the asymptotic formula of the number of solutions.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一类同余方程组解数的公式或渐近公式。

sentences.english: Especially, people pay much attention to those normal subgroup.
sentences.chinese: 这些子群中，人们特别关注那些正规的同余子群。

sentences.english: We show that all fuzzy congruence relations on a semigroup is a lattice.
sentences.chinese: 证明了一个半群上所有模糊同余关系作成一个格。

sentences.english: The algorithm for encrypting images through sequences from linear congruence generator was described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了基于该线性同余随机序列的图像加解密算法。

sentences.english: On this base, some properties of fuzzy good congruences on adequate semigroups are given.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，给出了适当半群上模糊好同余的性质。

sentences.english: Then we study the idempotent-separating congruences on the orthogroups with group kernel normal systems and give it a simple rep.
sentences.chinese: 利用群核正规系讨论了纯正群的幂等元分离同余。

sentences.english: This paper mainly deals with structures of some quasi-completely regular semiringsand congruence on them.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究某些拟完全正则半环的结构与同余。

sentences.english: In this paper, we give some study of the homomorphisms of crytogroups and the idempotentseparating congruences on orthogroups.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了密群的同态和纯正群的幂等元分离同余。

sentences.english: The linear congruent generators (LCG)arc widely applied to emulation and simulation.
sentences.chinese: 线性同余发生器使用普遍。

sentences.english: The semiring congruence on a class of generalized regular semiring S was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类广义正则半环S上的半环同余。

sentences.english: The congruences on a regular semigroup is completely determined by its idempotent congruence classes.
sentences.chinese: 正则半群上的同余是由其幂等元同余类所完全决定的。

sentences.english: Methods—The congruence triples are constructed and its properties analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法构造同余三元组，并分析其性质。

sentences.english: It is well known that congruences on regular semigroups are good.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，正则半群上的同余都是好同余。

sentences.english: It is well known that congruences on regular semigroups are good.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，正则半群上的同余都是好同余。

definition: rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)
the power of a number (square, cube etc)/to exponentiate (math.)
